original_text: Then the eyes of both were opened, and they knew that they were naked. And they sewed fig leaves together and made themselves loincloths.
korean_text: 이에 그들의 눈이 밝아져 자기들이 벗은 줄을 알고 무화과나무 잎을 엮어 치마로 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: Then the eyes of both were opened
and they knew that they were naked
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 자신들이 알몸인 것을 알게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: And they sewed fig leaves together
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 무화과 잎을 함께 꿰맸습니다
